title: New Rotor 2INpower SL power meter crankset is said to be their lightest yet
content:
Rotor claims the new 2INpower SL crankset is the lightest and stiffest dual-sided power meter available.

Read the full article at New Rotor 2INpower SL power meter crankset is said to be their lightest yet on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
